name: LatestTechNews
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, what's in the news?”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
Listen to the latest in tech, gadget and gaming news. Once you enable this skill you can just say "Alexa, what's my flash briefing" to hear the latest daily update. You can say "Alexa, stop" to exit anytime.

This skill was created using a Skill Blueprint by TechNewsGadget. Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer. If you have any questions or run into a problem, please let us know. Thanks!
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
